comments.body:
is this the same as: 
  Padding:  top=24, bottom=16
    Text: product.description
?

Yes, in fact I started out with code like that. I found that adding SizedBox vertical spacers made the layout easier to read, particularly in the context of the redline document I was following.  In other words the vertical gaps defined by the SizedBox(height: dy) correspond to explicit gaps called out in the design.

Hopefully what I've done doesn't add any noticeable cost.
